title: The Mist Stage One: The Prelude/The Cumulative Effect
description: THE MIST is a spy thriller dealing with today’s conspiracies, mostly political, and regarding intelligence agencies. Our spy Tanya is a Pakistani black ops agent belonging to a secret intelligence agency that officially doesn’t exist. This intelligence agency, called THE MIST, is independent with the power to investigate the governing bodies, including the President, as well as the other intelligence agencies working under the government or the army. THE MIST Stage One (The Prelude) is the first of a two-part series where we follow our lovely spy, Tanya into a world of intrigue, exploring different cultures amazingly linked, discovering the colours and flavours of various societies within societies, historical legends- and basic human nature- in her quest for the truth.
author: Nagwa Malik
